original_text: And he did that which was right in the sight of the Lord, according to all that his father Amaziah did.
korean_text: 웃시야가 그의 아버지 아마샤의 모든 행위대로 여호와 보시기에 정직하게 행하며

sentences.original_text: And he did that which was right
in the sight of the Lord,
according to all that his father Amaziah did.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 부친 아마샤가 행한 모든 일대로 하였더라
